description: TokenFarm.withdraw() (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#78-99) ignores return value by lpToken.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#96)

description:
TokenFarm.distributeRewards(address) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#175-192) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- share = userStaking / totalStakingBalance (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#185)
	- pendingRewards[beneficiary] += (reward * share) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#189)
markdown:
[TokenFarm.distributeRewards(address)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L175-L192) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [share = userStaking / totalStakingBalance](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L185)
	- [pendingRewards[beneficiary] += (reward * share)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L189)

description:
TokenFarm.deposit(uint256) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#49-73) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- checkpoints[msg.sender] == 0 (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#66)
markdown:
[TokenFarm.deposit(uint256)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L49-L73) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [checkpoints[msg.sender] == 0](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L66)

description:
Reentrancy in TokenFarm.deposit(uint256) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#49-73):
	External calls:
	- lpToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#53)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- checkpoints[msg.sender] = block.number (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#67)
	- distributeRewards(msg.sender) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#70)
		- checkpoints[beneficiary] = block.number (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#191)
	- hasStaked[msg.sender] = true (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#61)
	- isStaking[msg.sender] = true (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#64)
	- distributeRewards(msg.sender) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#70)
		- pendingRewards[beneficiary] += (reward * share) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#189)
	- stakers.push(msg.sender) (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#60)
	- stakingBalance[msg.sender] += _amount (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#55)
	- totalStakingBalance += _amount (contracts/TokenFarm.sol#57)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [TokenFarm.deposit(uint256)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L49-L73):
	External calls:
	- [lpToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L53)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [checkpoints[msg.sender] = block.number](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L67)
	- [distributeRewards(msg.sender)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L70)
		- [checkpoints[beneficiary] = block.number](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L191)
	- [hasStaked[msg.sender] = true](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L61)
	- [isStaking[msg.sender] = true](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L64)
	- [distributeRewards(msg.sender)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L70)
		- [pendingRewards[beneficiary] += (reward * share)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L189)
	- [stakers.push(msg.sender)](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L60)
	- [stakingBalance[msg.sender] += _amount](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L55)
	- [totalStakingBalance += _amount](contracts/TokenFarm.sol#L57)

description:
Lock.withdraw() (contracts/Lock.sol#23-33) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= unlockTime,You can't withdraw yet) (contracts/Lock.sol#27)
markdown:
[Lock.withdraw()](contracts/Lock.sol#L23-L33) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= unlockTime,You can't withdraw yet)](contracts/Lock.sol#L27)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(block.timestamp < _unlockTime,Unlock time should be in the future)
